properties.description: creates the view needed for cost centre data for PBI

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = 'miPINS' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [miPINS]');
GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR COST CENTRE--

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW miPINS.vw_mipins_hr_cost_centre
AS

SELECT DISTINCT

CASE
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '-1'      THEN 1
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90000'   THEN 2
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90100'   THEN 3
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90110'   THEN 4
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90111'   THEN 5
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90113'   THEN 6
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90114'   THEN 7
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90116'   THEN 8
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90117'   THEN 10
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90118'   THEN 12
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90119'   THEN 13
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90120'   THEN 14
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90121'   THEN 15
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90125'   THEN 16
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90128'   THEN 18
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90130'   THEN 19
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90132'   THEN 21
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90135'   THEN 22
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90200'   THEN 23
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90205'   THEN 24
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90210'   THEN 25
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90220'   THEN 28
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90221'   THEN 33
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90300'   THEN 35
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90310'   THEN 36
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90320'   THEN 38
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90330'   THEN 40
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90340'   THEN 42
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90341'   THEN 44
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90342'   THEN 45
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90343'   THEN 46
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90345'   THEN 47
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90350'   THEN 48
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90360'   THEN 49
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90400'   THEN 50
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90410'   THEN 51
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90415'   THEN 53
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90420'   THEN 54
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90430'   THEN 55
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90440'   THEN 57
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90460'   THEN 59
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90500'   THEN 60
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90520'   THEN 61
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90530'   THEN 64
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90540'   THEN 65
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90544'   THEN 67
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90545'   THEN 68
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90547'   THEN 71
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90550'   THEN 72
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90600'   THEN 73
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90610'   THEN 74
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90620'   THEN 76
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90622'   THEN 78
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90630'   THEN 80
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90640'   THEN 81
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90646'   THEN 84
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90647'   THEN 85
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90648'   THEN 86
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90650'   THEN 87
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90700'   THEN 88
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90705'   THEN 90
    WHEN CostCenterCode = '90800'   THEN 91
    ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
END                 AS Cost_Centre_Key,
CostCenterCode      AS [Cost Centre Code],
Description         AS [Cost Centre]--,
--IsActive            AS IsActive,
--IngestionDate       AS IngestionDate,
--ValidTo             AS ValidTo

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].hr_costcenter_dim

GO
